body.description: Only Playtex Sport Tampons have a 360° design and FlexFit technology that moves the way you move. Playtex Sport Tampons are great tampons for swimming, biking, running or whatever your activity of choice is. Playtex Sport Tampons Unscented, feature 360 SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION tampon designed to fit your body and its every move for a protective leakage barrier. with unique FLEXFIT interlocking FIBERS Playtex Sport tampons work quickly to TRAP LEAKS. The contoured applicator of Playtex Sport Tampons allow for COMFORTABLE, precise placement. Playtex Sport Tampons Unscented Super Plus Absorbency, keeping you protected throughout your period. Playtex Sport Tampons - PLAY ON!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Performance Period Gear Our 360° FlexFit design expands to fit your body and move with you - so your period can't slow you down.

Protection For Bodies In Motion 360° Triple Layer Protection Our 360° design expands to fit you from all angles with backup layers for added protection. Leak-Trapping Flexfit Technology FlexFit interlocking fibers move with you and quickly trap leaks. Comfortable Contoured Applicator With a slimmed tip and no-slip grip, our contoured applicator is designed for comfortable, precise placement.

Playtex Sport Playtex Sport Odor Shield Playtex Sport Compact Description: 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION designed to fit and adjust to your body with every move for powerful leak protection. 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION Designed with Odor Shield technology to neutralize odors for ultimate freshness. 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION Designed to comfortably fit your active life and fits in the palm of your hand. Technology: Flex Fit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection Contoured Tip & No-Slip Grip Applicator For comfortable, precise placement. Odor Shield technology neutralizes odors. Up to 2x more odor fighting protection vs. Playtex Sport Flex Fit Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection Contoured Tip & No- Slip Grip Applicator for comfortable, precise placement. Designed with Compact Applicator. Pull and Click into Place. 30% Smaller than full-size tampons *based on length before extension Flex Fit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection. Absorbency: Regular, Super, Super Plus, Ultra Regular, Super Regular, Super Scent: Unscented Unscented Unscented

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Switching brands after years!
reviews.reviewText: After many years of using another brand they changed the wrapper and as silly as it may seem it was enough for me to look for another type of tampon. Well, I am so happy that I did because these are amazing! They are so much more comfortable to insert and once they are in they are always in place the right way. With my last brand (also a good name brand) sometimes they would hurt like they weren’t in right. I am 40+ years old, this is not new to me. I have 3 kids. Maybe my body is not average, I don’t know. But for whatever reason these are perfect every time! I’ve never had an issue with them leaking or anything like that either. I hope these stay around for as long as I have my period!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When it comes to period protection, Playtex Sport Tampons in both Super and Regular sizes have been my go-to choice for years. These tampons offer reliable performance and a range of absorbencies to suit every day of my period.Playtex Sport Tampons are known for their Flex-Fit design, which allows them to move with your body during physical activities, providing a comfortable and secure fit. Whether I'm working out, running errands, or simply going about my daily routine, I can trust these tampons to stay in place without any discomfort.These tampons come equipped with a unique 360° protection barrier to help prevent leaks. I've found this feature to be highly effective, providing peace of mind even on my heaviest flow days. The absorbent core quickly locks away menstrual fluid, so I can stay confident and worry-free.The plastic applicator is easy to grip and use, ensuring a smooth and comfortable insertion process. The tampons are well-packaged, making them perfect for on-the-go use. The clear instructions on the packaging are also helpful for anyone new to tampons.The combination of sizes, comfort, leak protection, ease of use, and overall reliability makes them my top choice. Whether you're active, on the move, or simply need dependable protection throughout your period, Playtex Sport Tampons have you covered. These tampons have been a staple in my period care routine for good reason, and I wholeheartedly recommend them to anyone looking for a hassle-free, comfortable, and reliable tampon option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have always loved Playtex sport tampons. I believe they are the most comfortable and flexible. I don't even use it for sports anymore, just for everywhere lol. They are super easy to use and self-explanatory. Very absorbent and you can't feel when it's full which I like.
